import "../Cart/cartView.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import React, {useContext} from "react"; import { CartContext } from "../Store/CartContext"; const CartView = ({id, title, price, pictureUrl, quantity}) => { const {removeItem, totalPrice} = useContext(CartContext); return (
  PRODUCTO DESCRIPCIÓN PRECIO CANTIDAD SUBTOTAL

{title}

{price}

{quantity}

{totalPrice(price,quantity)}
); } export default CartView;
